title: Are the Nets the Best Team in the NBA? | Group Chat
description:
Today we’re joined by ESPN writer Royce Young to discuss the Brooklyn Nets after their impressive victory against the Bucks without Kyrie Irving, and power rank the best teams in the league (35:00). Later, Justin, Tjarks, and Rob talk about CJ McCollum’s recent foot injury and more in another edition of Show and Take (55:00).
Hosts: Justin Verrier, Jonathan Tjarks, and Rob Mahoney
Guest: Royce Young
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
